description:
VR Photo Converter creates a stereo image from VR180 photos.

VR Photo Converter - Convert VR180 images to one image
VR Photo Converter creates a stereo image from VR180 photos. It extracts the image of the right eye from a Google VR180 format photo and puts it next to the left eye photo. VR Photo Converter is availalble for Windows, macOS and Linux.
